comments.author: Welsh
comments.body: I don't use half of these, but I will say that Sportsbet do have a nice search feature that a lot of other gambling websites don't seem to implement. I actually, don't like the way Sportsbet is set out with the categories, but the search feature makes up for it. Even fiat gambling websites don't tend to have a search feature like this. So, if you're going to be designing a gambling platform, it's probably worth considering. I imagine most users lean towards using the search function rather than going through the categories manually. Especially, when betting on obscure sports, that you might not be familiar with. For example, with the World Cup coming up you might know France are playing, but you might not know it's the qualifying or the actual world cup, so typing in "France", generally clears that up for you.
